actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-92.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 3363 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1980 and 1981 for the Department of State, the International Communication Agency, and the Board for International Broadcasting.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3363 (Funding of the Department of State, the International Communications Agency, and the Board for International Broadcasting).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 3363 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1980 and 1981 for the Department of State, the International Communication Agency, and the Board for International Broadcasting.
